directions: Scrape seeds from vanilla bean with tip of a sharp knife into a 2-quart saucepan and add pod, water, sugar, zest, and thyme sprigs. Bring to a boil, stirring until sugar is dissolved, then add apricots and simmer, stirring once or twice, until tender, 2 to 6 minutes (depending on ripeness).
Spoon syrup over warm apricots in bowls and top with dollops of crème fraîche.
ingredients: 10 fresh apricots, halved and pitted (1 3/4 pound)
title: Poached Apricots in Vanilla-Thyme Syrup with Crème Fraîche
